verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lamp unto my feet
Light unto my path
It is You, Jesus
It is You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This treasure that I hold
More than finest gold
It is You, Jesus
It is You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
With all my heart
With all my soul
I live to worship You
And praise forevermore
Praise forevermore

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord, everyday
I need You more
On wings of Heaven, I will soar
With You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You take my brokenness
And call me to yourself
There You stand
Heal me in Your hand
